title: Mathematics Teacher
desc: Classroom teacher of mathematics.  Have taught Algebra, Geometry and Algebra 2 & Trigonometry on the NYS Regents Track.  Have taught PreCalculus at both the non-honors and honors levels.  Currently teach AP Calculus AB and AP Statistics.

title: Private Math Tutor
desc: Proficient in all high school math courses and can provide 1-to-1 and small group tutoring either in-person or remotely.  Also able to provide quality SAT and ACT tutoring in the math content area.
